info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 6:40PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light snow increases over Southwest Montana tonight through Sunday morning... Light snow over the higher terrain of Southwest Montana will continue this evening and will expand to the valleys after midnight. Snowfall accumulations will be light and will generally range from trace amounts up to a couple of inches, highest over the higher terrain along the Continental Divide and Southwest Montana. Although snowfall amounts will be light, those traveling should still be prepared for reduced visibility below one mile at times and winter driving conditions tonight into Sunday morning. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.
